message: Which is why Blair is so against Corbyn being elected. People should stop spouting who should and who should not be elected and saying things like """"let's ask one candidate to drop out so Corbyn will lose"""" and just let the democratic and electoral practice take its place and elect the person into office. Then the people might just look on and think okay, they did that fairly and properly and so maybe, we can begin to trust them once more and hey, maybe we can vote for them too.
